name: The North
description: You survived endless winters in the north. In return you got strong and independent.

name: Town life
description: You grew up in more stable circumstances.

name: The forest
description: You grew up hunting and living a lonely life in the forest.

name: Royal blood
description: Blessed with being born into the majestic life. Yet you choose everything else.

name: Wanderer
description: Following the road wheverever it takes you. It made you adaptable.

name: Thief Life
description: You love to steal what you see fit is yours.

name: Army
description: Growing up in the army and follwing their rules without hesitation. It made you direct and trustworthy.
